page.title: 08TOURISTS IN ABERDYFI
page.content:
The eighty two visitors interviewed on Sunday 2nd June 1985 had travelled from: {West Midlands 43% { Shropshire 14% { Lancashire 8% { Staffordshire 6%} Other places mentioned included;Avon, Essex,Norfolk,Linconshire,Yorkshire, Somerset and Sussex. When questioned as to{LIKES}and{ {DISLIKES}the most common replies were:
{LIKES DISLIKES cleanliness lack of cafes. friendliness lack of parking space. accommodation speed boats. scenery high food prices. quietness lack of hire deckchairs estuary/beach Sunday drink laws.
